import React from 'react' import { InputLabel, TextField } from '@mui/material' import styles from './employeeForm.module.scss' import { FormControl, MenuItem, Select } from '@mui/base' const EmployeeForm = () => { const [age, setAge] = React.useState(''); const handleChange = (event) => { setAge(event?.target?.value); }; return (
Age
) } export default EmployeeForm
